SQLSRV
PHP Manual

Introduction

The SQLSRV extension allows you to access Microsoft SQL Server and SQL Azure databases when running PHP on Windows.

The SQLSRV extension is supported by Microsoft and available for download here: » http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/sqlserver/ff657782.aspx.
